snippet: The Nets are arriving in a different era in Brooklyn. In simpler times, Brooklyn ballers only needed a ball, a park and a dream.
abstract: Dan Klores Essay notes that, while the is much fanfare about the arrival of the Brooklyn Nets, the sounds of pickup games will continue in Brooklyn parks, where future stars will get their start and others will dream of it.
lead_paragraph: The Nets are arriving in a different era in Brooklyn. In simpler times, Brooklyn ballers only needed a ball, a park and a dream.

headline.seo: Before Nets, a Ball, Park and Dream Defined Basketball
headline.main: The Brooklyn Game Had Its Own Beat
headline.print_headline: The Brooklyn Game Had Its Own Beat
